PARAGRAPH: Dimtcho Krassimirov Dimov was born on September 7th, 1995 in Sofia Bulgaria. He then moved to Canada in 1997 as his parents pursued their careers. When he was in 5th grade they moved to the United States in Seattle. After completing some computer science classes in high school he decided that a career in information technology wouldbe right for him so he decided on attending the University of Washington. He is now a junior and is pursuing a bachleors degree with a major of informatics
